node.name: Legal Consultation
node.shortDescription: One Person Company is a legal entity which has only one person as a member who will act in the capacity of a director as well as a shareholder.

node.name: Shifting of Registered Office
node.shortDescription: As per Section 7 of the Companies Act, 2013 all registered companies are required to have a registered office address in India from the date of commencement of business or within thirty days from the date of incorporation whichever is earlier.

node.name: Convert Proprietorship Firm to Private Limited Company
node.shortDescription: Proprietorship is an unregistered business entity owned, managed, and controlled by one person.

node.name: Incorporation of Limited liability Partnership
node.shortDescription: A limited liability partnership (LLP) is a partnership in which some or all partners have limited liabilities.

node.name: Incorporation of Private Limited Company
node.shortDescription: A private limited company is a type of company that offers limited liability or legal protection for members.

node.name: Incorporation of Partnership Firm
node.shortDescription: Partnership is an association of two or more people formed for the purpose of carrying on a business.

node.name: Incorporation One Person Company
node.shortDescription: One Person Company is a legal entity which has only one person as a member who will act in the capacity of a director as well as a shareholder.

node.name: Increase in Authorized Capital
node.shortDescription: According to Section 2 (8) of the Companies Act, 2013 “Authorized Capital” is the capital that is authorized by the memorandum of the company to be the maximum amount of the share capital of the company.

node.name: Convert Proprietorship Firm to Private Limited Company
node.shortDescription: Proprietorship is an unregistered business entity owned, managed, and controlled by one person.

node.name: Trademark Registration
node.shortDescription: A trademark or service mark is a word, name, symbol, or device used to indicate the source, quality and ownership of a product or service.
